author: PasiekaFUW
body:
#### PR description:

  - Created a data analysis tools that work for 2018 simulation. 
  - It may be updated for 2025 later.
  - Documentation in PDF: https://github.com/PasiekaFUW/cmssw/blob/GregBranch/Validation/CTPPS/test/simu/ReadMe.pdf

#### PR validation:

- No formal testing was performed. The code was moved to different directory and run from scratch without errors.
title: Greg_Jedrzej_branch
